    • Method Detail

      • sendMsg

        public void sendMsg(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                    String msg,
                    boolean pagination)
        Plugin method to easily send messages to players (and console too). This is the core of all the sender methods included here.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender to send the message to.
        msg - The message to be sent.
        pagination - Whether to paginate the message or not.
        Since:
        1.2.2

      • sendMsg

        public void sendMsg(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                    String msg)
        Plugin method to easily send messages to players (and console too). This version assumes you want to paginate the message.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender to send the message to.
        msg - The message to be sent.
        Since:
        1.2.2

      • sendPluginMsg

        public void sendPluginMsg(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                          String msg,
                          boolean pagination)
        Plugin method to easily send messages prefixed with the plugin name. Prefixes the message with the plugin name and calls sendMsg.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender to send the message to.
        msg - The message to be sent.
        pagination - Whether to paginate the message or not.
        Since:
        1.2
        See Also:
        sendMsg

      • log

        public void log(String msg)
        Plugin method to easily log messages to the console. Actually just calls sendPluginMsg and specifies the sender as the server's ConsoleCommandSender.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to be sent to the console.
        Since:
        1.2
        See Also:
        sendPluginMsg

      • logStackTrace

        public void logStackTrace(Exception ex)
        Plugin method to easily log caught exceptions to the console. Actually uses a for loop to log for each line of the pieced-together stacktrace.
        Parameters:
        ex - The Exception to log a stacktrace for.
        Since:
        1.2
        See Also:
        log
